author: Barbier, Guillaume and Perrier, Pascal and Ménard, Lucie and Boë, Louis-Jean
title: Contrôle lingual en production de parole chez l'enfant de 4 ans : une méthodologie associant étude articulatoire et modélisation biomécanique (Tongue control in 4-years-old children's speech production: A methodology combining articulatory study and biomechanical modeling) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 1: JEP
